title: [LottieAnimationView] repeatCount is not taken into account
body:
** If you don't use this template, your issue will be closed **

**Checklist**

1. My animation doesn't use any [unsupported features](http://airbnb.io/lottie/#/supported-features).
2. I know what part of my animation doesn't work.
3. I have created a simplified version of my animation 
4. I have attached the AEP file (as a zip file so it can be attached) that only has the part of the animation that doesn't work.

**Describe the bug**
The repeat count is not taken into account if we start the animation when the LottieAnimationView is not visible

**What version of Lottie did you test this on?**
3.3.1

**What version of Android did you test this on?**
Android 9.0

**Steps To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. create LottieAnimationView
2. hide the view
3. set repeatCount at 2 (or more) 
4. start playAnimation()
5. show the view
6. the animation is played only once


**Screenshots**

```
    fun playAnimation() {
        if(lottie_view.isShown) {
            lottie_view.repeatCount = 2
            lottie_view.playAnimation()
            // HERE Animation will be trigger three times
        }
        else {
            lottie_view.repeatCount = 2
            lottie_view.playAnimation()
            // HERE The animation is not played immediately, it will be played
            // only when the view is visible, but however it will be played only
            // once instead of the 3 times desired
        }
    }
```
